name: Loss of Sol
description:
Shortly after the sun mysteriously disappears you escape the chaos that ensues, but soon you encounter much more troubling things. In a race to find out just what is happening and why the sun is missing, you also must hide from their lights. Will you persevere and find the answers you need or be subjected to the cruel nature of the unknown?

This game was created during the Brackey's Game Jam. The theme is light so I decided to have light play a major part in the aesthetic of the game. The game at the moment is extremely short since I didn't have much time to expand upon the narrative events. If people would like to see more, let me know!
